mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EDU_QNA (QNA_NO, EDU_NO, BOARD_GB, SECRET_YN, TITLE, Q_CONTENTS, Q_USER_NO, VISIT_NO, QUESTION_DT) VALUES (SEQ_EDU_QNA.NEXTVAL, #{edu_no}, #{board_gb}, #{secret_yn}, #{title}, #{q_contents}, #{q_user_no}, #{visit_no} ,SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, QNA_NO, TITLE, QUESTION_DT, VISIT_NO, BOARD_GB, Q_CONTENTS FROM( SELECT QNA_NO, TITLE, QUESTION_DT, VISIT_NO, BOARD_GB, q_contents FROM T_EDU_QNA WHERE 1=1 and BOARD_GB=#{board_gb} ORDER BY QNA_NO) ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

and (TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{ searchWord},'%')) OR Q_CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{ searchWord},'%')))
